name: A Monster Make-up Girl Dress up Salon - Style me on a little spooky holiday night makeover fashion party for kids
name_original: A Monster Make-up Girl Dress up Salon - Style me on a little spooky holiday night makeover fashion party for kids
description:
Dress up your own 'Halloween Scary Monster Fashion Girls' like never before!

Choose from all kinds of tops, dresses, skirts, boots, and bags! Then you can even dazzle things up with jewellery! It's a total halloween makeover!

This is the BEST dress up game in the app store!
